heading: HB07817
0: AN ACT DECLARING THE CONFERMENT OF A DOCTORATE DEGREE AS EQUIVALENT TO ENTRY LEVEL CAREER EXECUTIVE SERVICE OFFICER (CESO VI) IN THE CIVIL SERVICE
status: Pending with the Committee on CIVIL SERVICE AND PROFESSIONAL REGULATION since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07817
FULL TITLE : AN ACT DECLARING THE CONFERMENT OF A DOCTORATE DEGREE AS EQUIVALENT TO ENTRY LEVEL CAREER EXECUTIVE SERVICE OFFICER (CESO VI) IN THE CIVIL SERVICE
ABSTRACT : Grants the same benefits and privileges of CESO VI to holders of doctorate degrees for appointment and promotion to executive positions in civil service.
ALIAS NAME : “CESO Equivalency Act of 2018”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SY-ALVARADO, JOSE ANTONIO "KUYA JONATHAN" R.
DATE FILED : 2018-05-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON CIVIL SERVICE AND PROFESSIONAL REGULATION ON 2018-07-30
